test-case.name: CheckingThatASingleItemIsPricedCorrectly
test-case.output:
No browser or unknown browser Using Chrome Given I have Logged into my Account TechTalk.SpecFlow.ScenarioContext Returning true - did log in -> done: CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.GivenIHaveLoggedIntoMyAccount() (1.9s) When I Add an Item to my Cart -> done: CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.WhenIAddAnItemToMyCart() (1.9s) And I enter the Coupon Code -> done: CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.WhenIEnterTheCouponCode() (0.1s) Then the Total Price Takes 15% off of the Original Price Sub Total found is £18.00 Site's calculated discount amount is : £3.60 Original price is 18.00 Discount amount is 2.70 Site calculated discount is 3.60 -> error: Multiple failures or warnings in test: 1) Expected: 3.6m But was: 2.7m
2) Site does not give 15% off instead it was 20.0% (1.1s) And Logout of My Account -> skipped because of previous errors

failure.message:
Multiple failures or warnings in test: 1) Expected: 3.6m But was: 2.7m
2) Site does not give 15% off instead it was 20.0%
failure.stack-trace: at Final_Project_Edgewords.StepDefinitions.CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.ThenTheTotalPriceTakesOffOfTheOriginalPrice(Int32 percentage) in C:\Users\HarryWilliams\source\repos\Final Project Edgewords\Final Project Edgewords\StepDefinitions\CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.cs:line 95 at TechTalk.SpecFlow.Bindings.BindingInvoker.InvokeBinding(IBinding binding, IContextManager contextManager, Object[] arguments, ITestTracer testTracer, TimeSpan& duration) at TechTalk.SpecFlow.Infrastructure.TestExecutionEngine.ExecuteStepMatch(BindingMatch match, Object[] arguments, TimeSpan& duration) at TechTalk.SpecFlow.Infrastructure.TestExecutionEngine.ExecuteStep(IContextManager contextManager, StepInstance stepInstance) at TechTalk.SpecFlow.Infrastructure.TestExecutionEngine.OnAfterLastStep() at TechTalk.SpecFlow.TestRunner.CollectScenarioErrors() at Final_Project_Edgewords.Features.CheckingPriceTableInCartFeature.ScenarioCleanup() at Final_Project_Edgewords.Features.CheckingPriceTableInCartFeature.CheckingThatASingleItemIsPricedCorrectly() in C:\Users\HarryWilliams\source\repos\Final Project Edgewords\Final Project Edgewords\Features\Checking Price Table in Cart.feature:line 11

test-case.name: CreatingAnOrderWithARetainableNumber
test-case.output: No browser or unknown browser Using Chrome Given I have Logged into my Account TechTalk.SpecFlow.ScenarioContext Returning true - did log in -> done: CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.GivenIHaveLoggedIntoMyAccount() (2.4s) When I Add an Item to my Cart -> done: CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.WhenIAddAnItemToMyCart() (2.2s) Then I am given an order number which matches between the order and account page Order number from Order Page is3261 Order number from My Account is 3261 -> done: CheckingPriceTableInCartStepDefinitions.ThenIAmGivenAnOrderNumberWhichMatchesBetweenTheOrderAndAccountPage() (5.1s)
